RelatedSentence: A grand jury in the Western District of Pennsylvania indicted five Chinese military hackers for computer hacking , economic espionage and other offenses directed at six American victims in the US nuclear power , metals and solar products industries .

The indictment alleges that Wang , Sun , and Wen , among others known and unknown to the grand jury , hacked or attempted to hack into US entities named in the indictment , while Huang and Gu supported their conspiracy by , among other things , managing infrastructure ( e.g. , domain accounts ) used for hacking .
